pli-tv-kd17:1.1.7: paricārayamāno → paricāriyamāno (sya-all, pts1ed, mr); vassike pāsāde cattāro māse → vassike pāsāde vassike cattāro māse (bj)
pli-tv-kd17:1.2.7: Niddhāpetvā → niḍḍahetabbaṁ niḍḍahetvā (bj); niddāpetabbaṁ niddāpetvā (sya-all); niḍḍāpetabbaṁ niḍḍāpetvā (pts1ed)
pli-tv-kd17:1.2.28: ti → imassa anantaraṁ kesuci potthakesu evampi pāṭho dissati
pli-tv-kd17:1.4.20: na nivatto → yaṁ nivatto (bj); yaṁ pana nivatto (sya-all)
pli-tv-kd17:3.12.3: abhirūpo vata, bho → abhirūpo vata bho gotamo (sya-all, km)
pli-tv-kd17:3.17.14: Sādhuṁ pāpena dukkaraṁ → sādhu pāpena dukkaraṁ (ud5.8:1 [Saṅghabhedasutta])
pli-tv-kd17:4.1.25: bhikkhūnaṁ saññattiyā”ti → bhikkhusaññattiyāti (bj, sya-all, pts1ed); bhikkhū saññattiyā (mr)
pli-tv-kd17:5.5.20: tasmiṁ dhammadiṭṭhi bhede dhammadiṭṭhi … → etthantare pāṭho sya-all potthakesu natthi, vimativinodanīṭīkāya sameti
pli-tv-kd17:5.5.48: tasmiṁ dhammadiṭṭhi, bhede dhammadiṭṭhi … → etthantare pāṭho sya-all potthakesu natthi
